name: comfyui-drawthings-grpc
description: Connect to any Draw Things [gRPCServerCLI](https://github.com/drawthingsai/draw-things-community/tree/main?tab=readme-ov-file#self-host-grpcservercli-from-packaged-binaries) and let ComfyUI generate and provide DT with images for ControlNet without needing to set them in DT itself.
author: Kelly Jerrell
